metadata.topic: Topic 7: Redox Reactions, Chemical Cells and Electrolysis

topics: Topic 7: Redox Reactions, Chemical Cells and Electrolysis
questions.question: 1st statement During anodisation, the aluminium oxide on the surface of aluminium is reduced to metal 2nd statement The corrosion resistance of aluminium can be enhanced by anodisation

options.content: Both statements are true and the 2nd statement is a correct explanation of the 1st statement
Both statements are true but the 2nd statement is NOT a correct explanation of the 1st statement
The 1st statement is false but the 2nd statement is true
